metadata.title: CVE-2021-32294 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in libgig through 20200507. A heap-buffer-overflowexists in the function RIFF::List::GetSubList located in RIFF.cpp. Itallows an attacker to cause code Execution.

criterions.comment: libgig: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
